questions.question: The circle 25 = (x+3)^2 + (y+4)^2 is tangent to a line passing through the origin. What is the maximum y-value of the line at x=4?
questions.latex: \begin{multline*} 25 = (x + 3)^2 \\ + (y + 4)^2 \end{multline*} \text{is tangent to a line through the origin. What is the maximum } y\text{-value at } x=4?
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: How many 5-digit numbers (digits 0-9, no repetitions) are divisible by 5?
questions.latex: \text{How many 5-digit numbers (digits 0-9, no repetitions) are divisible by 5?}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: Given x + y = 23016 and LCM = 299039, find max(x, y).
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: Given \\ $(4 + \tan^2 A)(5 + \tan^2 B) = \sqrt{320} \tan A \tan B$ \\ Find $\tan^2 B \times \tan A$. \\ Constraints: $0 < A, B < \frac{\pi}{2}$
questions.latex: \text{Given } \\ (4 + \tan^2 A)(5 + \tan^2 B) = \sqrt{320} \tan A \tan B \\ \text{Find } \tan^2 B \times \tan A. \\ \text{Constraints: } 0 < A, B < \frac{\pi}{2}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu and CSMC Q6 2018

questions.question: 2 marbles are drawn from a bag containing 5 red, 3 blue, and 2 green marbles. What is the probability both are red?
questions.latex: \text{A bag contains 5 red, 3 blue, and 2 green marbles.} \\ \text{If 2 marbles are drawn, what is the probability both are red?}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: 2 marbles are drawn from a bag containing 5 red, 3 blue, and 2 green marbles. What is the probability that one is blue?
questions.latex: \text{A bag contains 5 red, 3 blue, and 2 green marbles.} \\ \text{If 2 marbles are drawn, what is the probability exactly one is blue?}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: Two rooks are placed on random empty squares of a 6x6 chess board. What is the probability they do not attack each other?
questions.latex: \text{Two rooks are placed on random empty squares of a 6x6 chess board.} \\ \text{What is the probability they do not attack each other?}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: A fair die is rolled 8 times. What is the probability that all 6 faces appear at least once?
questions.latex: \text{A fair die is rolled 8 times.} \\ \text{What is the probability that all 6 faces appear at least once?}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu

questions.question: A 3-digit number is formed by choosing 3 distinct digits from the set {0, 1, ..., 9}. What is the probability that the number is divisible by 3 and the largest of the three digits is in the hundreds place?
questions.latex: \text{A 3-digit number is formed by choosing 3 distinct digits} \\ \text{from the set } \{0, 1, \dots, 9\}. \\ \text{What is the probability that the number is divisible by 3} \\ \text{and the largest digit is in the hundreds place?}
questions.author: Yipeng Lu
